programme.desc: Andini is a tomboy girl who has a crush on a rich man who likes to show off his wealth, this man named Beno. Bella, Andini's best friend, suggested that Andini have a boyfriend so that Beno would not bother Andini anymore.One day she met a strange man named Reza.

programme.title: Ngga Usah Ngadi Ngadi Nanti Kamu Jatuh Hati
programme.desc: Derry broke off his love affair with Vina because they were involved in arguments and misunderstandings. programme.title: La Mediterranee N'est Pas Morte
programme.desc: 'If we do nothing, in twenty years, the Mediterranean will be a dead sea!'': this phrase by Jacques-Yves Cousteau was uttered in 1979. Forty-five years later, despite a certain amount of progress, his observation remains just as valid. Has the battle been lost? Franck Lorrain investigates.

programme.title: Chasseurs D'etoiles - EP 5
programme.desc: We head for Estrie, for an exceptional view of the Moon. An encounter with Myriam Lemelin, specialist in lunar soil and member of a Nasa research team. Then it's time for a major challenge: to film the International Space Station live, tricky given that it travels at 28,000 km/h.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: La Sirene
programme.desc: 1980, in southern Iran. The people of Abadan are resisting the Iraqi siege. Fourteen-year-old Omid is thinking with his grandfather about how to help people escape if the enemy seizes the town. They find an abandoned sailing boat in the harbour, which they now need to repair.

programme.title: Un Week-End
programme.desc: For 10 year-old Hector, the coming weekend is certain to be a very special one. He's about to meet his father, someone he hardly knows, and spend two days and two nights with him.

programme.title: Mere De Ma Mere
programme.desc: Confronted with the emotional difficulties of a mother in distress, 12 year-old Djenaba, takes on a parental role to protect her.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire - EP 18
programme.desc: Anemone sees her neurologist again and the empathy expressed by Dr Mancini pushes her to reveal things she had never said to anyone else. Maryse decides to keep Vincent in his job in Belleville, much to the disappointment of Lise, who decides to gamble everything in one last attempt.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire - EP 19
programme.desc: Anemone is playing with fire by daring to return to the property where she had lived with Ron and their children. The results of Caroline's genetic test are ready. Lise surprises her colleagues at the funeral parlour by announcing a major decision.

programme.title: Ethique Helvetique - EP 6
programme.desc: What shaped Swiss thought? By analysing the history of the country, Tristan Miquel and Julien Girardin question the ethical and philosophical challenges facing their society and draw up parallels between the past and the present to stimulate reflection on different schools of thought.

programme.title: Drole De Drame
programme.desc: When invited to his cousin Irwin Moyneux's house Archibald Soper, Bishop of Bedford, rigorously denounces the novels of successful author Felix Chapel. He doesn't know that in reality behind the pseudonym hides... his host! Intrigued by the absence of Margaret, Irwin's wife, he deduces that she has been assassinated.

programme.title: 2 Ou 3 Choses Que Je Ne Sais Pas D'elle
programme.desc: At 18, Lila has decided to wear the Muslim headscarf, much to the dismay of her family who have gathered to celebrate Eid. But, after an argument with her boyfriend she is in a resolutely bad mood and decides to slip away.

programme.desc: Little Leonore has been snatched from a creche during her afternoon nap, and the race is on to find her. The baby's parents were fighting for custody, with her father wanting to take her back to his home country. Was whoever kidnapped the child afraid of a judgement against them?

programme.title: Tandem - EP 10
programme.desc: Shots are heard on the shores of the Mejean lake, one of the rangers is found dead. The police quickly realise that the victim had been scheming in order to investigate around the stretch of water. Lea is convinced the victim was looking for something in the lake, but what?

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 9
programme.desc: Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.

programme.title: A La Vie, A La Terre - Nouvelle-Caledonie, L'inconnue Du Pacifique
programme.desc: Climate change is threatening the Pacific Islands: by the end of the century, some atolls may disappear. The inhabitants of Uvea and Vanuatu are trying to resist by launching a race against time. Scientists, guides, fisherman, lawyers, activists, elected representatives... We meet the guardians of a paradise not yet lost.

programme.title: Movie - Iruttu
programme.desc: A police officer investigates the mystery behind unnatural deaths after taking charge of his new post at a hill station.

programme.title: Movie - Love Birds
programme.desc: Mridula relocates abroad as she is devastated after her lover Arun's death. However, she meets a man who looks exactly like Arun and tries to find his true identity.

programme.title: Movie - Mappillai Vandachu
programme.desc: Mappillai Vanthachu is a Tamil feature film starring Gautami, Rashin Rahman, Chinni Jayanth and Goundamani.

programme.title: Movie - Vaazhndu Kattuvom
programme.desc: This movie stars Ramki, Gautami and Chinni Jayanth, and is directed by R Krishnamurthy.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Pillaikkaga
programme.desc: Pillaikkaga is a 1989 Indian Tamil-language action film written and directed by P. Vasu, produced by Mohan Natarajan and Tharangai V. Shanmugam under Rajakaliamman Pictures, starring Prabhu, Gautami, Nassar and Rekha.

programme.title: Movie - Thaaikulamae Thaaikulamae
programme.desc: While on a business tour, circumstances force a married man to marry another woman. However, his first wife happens to learn about his second marriage.

programme.title: Movie - Gopurangal Saivathillai
programme.desc: Mohan is forced to marry Arukkani, an illiterate village girl. Disappointed, he develops a secret relationship with a modern girl. But problems follow when he repents.

programme.title: Movie - Businessman
programme.desc: A highly-ambitious man comes to Mumbai with the idea of ruling the city. He turns into a local gangster and goes on to become a powerful businessman, whose intentions are not what they seem.

programme.title: Movie - Kaappan
programme.desc: A special agent is assigned to protect the Indian prime minister who later gets assassinated. Following this, he is tasked with finding the man or group responsible for the assassination.

programme.title: Movie - Ullam Kollai Pogudhey
programme.desc: Anbu, a dubbing artiste, falls in love with his sister's friend Jyothi, who is in love with Gautham. Just when they are about to get married, an accident changes the course of their lives forever.

programme.title: Movie - Seetha
programme.desc: Seetha is a 1990 Tamil-language thriller film directed by S. A. Chandrasekhar.

programme.title: Movie - Ellame En Thangachi
programme.desc: A family entertainer about a brother and sister.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Chinna Madam
programme.desc: Gopal falls in love with the wealthy Gayatri and eventually they get married. But Gayatri's constant quarrels with Gopal leads to his mother's death. In a fit of rage, Gopal murders Gayatri.

programme.title: Movie - Ennuyir Kannamma
programme.desc: En Uyir Kannamma is a 1988 Indian Tamil language film that marked the directorial debut of Sivachandran. The film stars Prabhu, Radha, Lakshmi and S. S. Chandran. The film had musical score by Ilaiyaraaja.

programme.title: Movie - Sundara Purushan
programme.desc: A young man returns home years after he ran away. He tries to win over his childhood love, but she is in love with someone else. His brother implicates the girl's lover in a murder and sends him to jail.

programme.title: Movie - Seenu
programme.desc: Kesavan is a popular singer while his younger brother Seenu constantly gets into trouble. Things take a turn when Kesavan falls prey to alcohol addiction and loses his fame.

programme.title: Movie - Poove Unakkaga
programme.desc: Raja learns that the girl he loves is in love with another man. When he comes to know about the long-standing dispute between both their families, he goes to their village to unite them.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Queen’s Club in London plays host to the HSBC Championships - with the tour returning to the annual tournament at the WTA 500-level after more than 50 years. The stunning outdoor venue in West Kensington is known for holding this long-standing annual grass court event, which was first played in 1889.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025 H/Ls
programme.desc: Catch all the thrills and spills from the clay courts at the Caja Mágica in Manzanares Park.

programme.title: Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers 2025 Group C: Slovakia vs USA
programme.desc: The 2025 Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers are being played as 6 groups of 3 nations as the Billie Jean King Cup Finals transit from a 12-team event to an 8 team event in 2025, mirroring the existing Davis Cup Final 8 format. Each 3 day qualifiers group event will be held in one location and played on a round-robin basis. The 6 group winners will join hosts China, and 2024 world champions Italy in the 2025 Finals in Shenzhen.

programme.title: HSBC BWF World Tour 2025
programme.desc: HSBC BWF World Tour is the eighth season of the BWF World Tour of badminton, a circuit of 31 tournaments that lead up to the World Tour Finals tournament. The tour features five levels, with different levels of prize money in each of the tournaments.

programme.title: Halo World Snooker C'ship 2025: R2-20 (Final) (Si Jiahui vs Ben Woolaston)
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 31
programme.desc: After a nomadic start to his career, it now seems that Pervis Estupinan has found his footballing home at Brighton & Hove Albion. The Ecuadorian international takes The Big Interview to the beachfront where he talks about influence of a former professional in the family while growing up, how playing in Spain helped him to become the Premier League performer he is today and his excitement for the future playing under Fabian Hurzeler.

programme.title: MATCH HIGHLIGHTS 24/25 MW07 Brighton and Hove Albion v Tottenham Hotspur
programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2024/25 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 2
programme.desc: We chart the rise of Portuguese star Rúben Dias, from his early days in Portugal to the heart of Manchester City's defence. We meet the family, friends, and coaches who shaped his journey, offering a rare glimpse into the upbringing and mindset that forged a Premier League leader. Then, in Manchester, Rúben reflects on his career so far, his impact at City, and the values that continue to drive him on.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 1
programme.desc: We catch up with Juan Mata in Australia, where the former Premier League star is now playing with Western Sydney Wanderers. The Spaniard reflects on his memorable years in England with Chelsea and Manchester United, sharing insights into his greatest moments, personal growth, and connection with fans. As he begins a new chapter down under, he also opens up about life after the Premier League and what lies ahead both on and off the pitch.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 2
programme.desc: Former Chelsea and Tottenham midfielder Gus Poyet chooses the best eleven teammates he shared a Premier League pitch with.

programme.title: GOALS OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (GB: SALAH)
programme.desc: From free kicks to bicycle kicks, relive some of the most memorable strikes from 2024/25 in a Premier League season.

programme.title: MATCH HIGHLIGHTS 24/25 MW07 Brentford v Wolverhampton Wanderers

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 42
programme.desc: In this PL Stories show, Tim Howard, who has neurodiverse conditions, leads a conversation with past and present players, exploring the challenges and strengths of living with neurodiversity. Through personal stories, including those of Joao Gomes (stutter), Steven Naismith (dyslexia), Greg Halford (autism), and Charlie Austin (ADHD), the show celebrates resilience and the positive impact neurodiverse traits bring to the football world.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 39
programme.desc: The Premier League is seeing a big boost in popularity amongst the Black American population and we travelled Stateside to learn more about this growing appeal. The show is led by Aaron Dolores, football fan and founder of Black Arrow, a creative movement on a quest to promote the intersection of football and black culture, not just in the US but worldwide.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 48
programme.desc: Reggae Rhythms in the Premier League explores the powerful connection between Jamaica and the world's most-watched football league, showcasing how the island's culture, music, and style have influenced the Premier League. We feature iconic Jamaican players who have left their mark, while also diving into the impact of reggae music, fashion, and fan culture on the game.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 41
programme.desc: A relationship steeped in glory, Chelsea Football Club is the Italian Job. Last summer, Enzo Maresca became the seventh manager from that heritage to take charge at Stamford Bridge. PL Stories looks back at the success shared between the club and managers from Italy, while also delving into Maresca's own unique coaching journey as he strives to emulate the achievements of those who came before him.

programme.title: CLASSIC MATCH 11/12
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2011/2012 season.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Themba Gorimbo vs. Luke Michael
programme.desc: This episode features Themba 'The Answer' Gorimbo and Luke 'Young Gun' Michael battling for the vacant welterweight championship. Vicious ground and pound ends this fight before the end of Round 1. Bonus coverage includes Sizwe Mnikathi vs. August Kayambala.

programme.title: WCCB Artur Beterbiev vs. Tavoris Cloud
programme.desc: Coming off a tremendous amateur career where he captured Gold Medals in the World Championships and European Championships, Olympian Artur Beterbiev takes a big step up in competition in just his 6th pro fight, taking on former IBF Light Heavyweight World Champion Tavoris Cloud. Beterbiev had stormed through his first five opponents, scoring four knockouts, two of which took place in the first round.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 3: Tokyo, Japan - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kyokushin Karate and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet and Breaking featuring Masters Shihan Yuzo Goda and Shihan Isamu Fukuda.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Manny Pacquiao vs. Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "The Dream Match" of Manny Pacquiao vs. Oscar De La Hoya that raked in $70 million in Pay-per-view revenue and launched Pacquiao into global stardom. Also on the card, action from a young Saul (Canelo) Alvarez.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 1 from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan features Takakeisho, Onosho, Kotoshoho and Daieisho.

programme.title: Introducing:
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS Presents 'Introducing:', a new original documentary series that covers the current stars of today and rising stars of tomorrow. Each episode we get an up close and personal perspective of their lives and see what drives them to be the best at what they do. Introducing: Caitlin Dechelle, provides an intimate look at one of the most dominant women in the history of martial arts tournaments.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode follows former UFC welterweight champion Matt Serra around his hometown in New Jersey for a look at the lighter side of this intense competitor. Ring girl Natasha Wicks shows us that the fighters aren't the only ones with the big guns. Plus a behind the scenes look at the UFC Fan Expo and an interview with MMA legend Chael Sonnen.

programme.title: WCCB Frank Martin vs. Artem Harutyunyan
programme.desc: Undefeated future star Frank "The Ghost" Martin takes on undefeated Olympic Bronze Medalist Artem Harutyunyan in a WBC Lightweight World Title eliminator. In the co-feature Elvis Rodriguez meets former world champion Viktor Postol on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: In the season premiere, dozens of contestants from across the west coast will compete on a redesigned course, featuring new obstacles like the Spinning Wheel, Slack Ladder and Jumping Bars!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Jason Litzau
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Adrien Broner taking on Jason Litzau in a fight that ends with a first-round TKO. Also on the card, action from light welterweight champ Amir Khan.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 2 from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan features Terunofuji, Tobizaru, Ryuden and Tamawashi.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Women's Weapons Championship at the ISKA US Open Championships held at Disney World, Orlando, FL, USA.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Jose Miguel Cotto vs. Saul (Canelo) Alvarez
programme.desc: This episode features the NABF welterweight championship on the line when Jose Miguel Cotto challenges Saul (Canelo) Alvaez, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA
programme.desc: The 16th Annual Fighters Only World MMA Awards are back this month on FIGHT SPORTSR, hosted again by one of the most entertaining personalities in MMA, Chael Sonnen and taking place at the Theater at the Virgin Hotels in Las Vegas. The event has become an annual tradition to honor the best fighters and moments in MMA over the previous year, including awards for male and female Fighter of the Year, Knockout of the Year, Fight of the Year, and many, many more.

programme.desc: Undefeated future star Frank "The Ghost" Martin takes on undefeated Olympic Bronze Medalist Artem Harutyunyan in a WBC Lightweight World Title eliminator. In the co-feature Elvis Rodriguez meets former world champion Viktor Postol on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: In the season premiere, dozens of contestants from across the west coast will compete on a redesigned course, featuring new obstacles like the Spinning Wheel, Slack Ladder and Jumping Bars!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Jason Litzau
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Adrien Broner taking on Jason Litzau in a fight that ends with a first-round TKO. Also on the card, action from light welterweight champ Amir Khan.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 2 from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan features Terunofuji, Tobizaru, Ryuden and Tamawashi.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Women's Weapons Championship at the ISKA US Open Championships held at Disney World, Orlando, FL, USA.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Jose Miguel Cotto vs. Saul (Canelo) Alvarez
programme.desc: This episode features the NABF welterweight championship on the line when Jose Miguel Cotto challenges Saul (Canelo) Alvaez, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA
programme.desc: The 16th Annual Fighters Only World MMA Awards are back this month on FIGHT SPORTSR, hosted again by one of the most entertaining personalities in MMA, Chael Sonnen and taking place at the Theater at the Virgin Hotels in Las Vegas. The event has become an annual tradition to honor the best fighters and moments in MMA over the previous year, including awards for male and female Fighter of the Year, Knockout of the Year, Fight of the Year, and many, many more.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Jean Pascal vs. Chad Dawson
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a Light Heavyweight Unification battle as WBO Champion Jean Pascal (25-1, 16 KOs) takes on undefeated IBO Champion, Chad Dawson, (29-0, 17 KOs) on August 14, 2010 at the Bell Centre in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. The fight ends in a decision after a controverial headbutt.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Floyd Mayweather vs. Felipe Garcia
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another exciting Greatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. One of the all-time greats is featured just one year from making his pro debut, as a 10-0 "Pretty Boy"Floyd Mayweather - long before he became "Money" - has a tough test against Felipe Garcia of Mexico.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBC welterweight title bout between Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Victor Ortiz, which generated $78 million in pay-per-view revenue from 1.25 million buys. Also on the card, action from super welterweight champ James Kirkland and Alfredo Angulo.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 3 from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan feature Hokutofuji, Todushoryu, Hoshoryu and Endo.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Fukuoka, Japan welcomes the top talent in the world of martial arts when Karate 1 Premier League returns. Fukuoka will host athletes from across the globe including last season's Grand Winners such as Hikaru Ono and Ayaka Saito competing in their home country. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League visits the port city of Fukuoka, Japan, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode is highlighted by a heartfelt interview with the legendary MMA Hall of Famer Tito Ortiz that shows you sides of the former champ you never knew from his childhood to his love of fishing to the man he is today. We stop by "Cowboy" Donald Cerrone's ranch to see you don't need the flashiest training equipment to be a world class fighter. Plus Nate Marquardt gets his dream car and UFC ring girls bring us on a tour of a new gym.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 5

programme.desc: Pixie loves to ride the clouds, but she can't understand why Kelp doesn’t love it, too. If they don't agree on this, does that mean they're not best friends anymore? / Kelp helps Ollie fulfill his dream of watching the white whale migration.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 15

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 52

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as major European financial centres take the reins of global markets. Get the first indication of how markets in Europe will react to an active Asian session and the handover from the US. programme.desc: Google & Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai sits down with Emily Chang to discuss the future of search, accelerating work on Google's AI models and how his upbringing prepared him for this moment.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Can Anduril Reboot the US Defense Industry? Emily Chang meets Anduril founder Palmer Luckey for a closer look at his defence tech startup's autonomous fleet and software operations.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Ryan Kaji is the reigning king of toy videos and one of YouTube's biggest and highest-paid social media stars. Emily Chang meets Ryan and his parents on the set of his new movie for a look at the young influencer's next act.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: How Youtube Became Must Watch TV. Emily Chang speaks with YouTube CEO Neal Mohan about the creator economy, staying atop the AI wave and transforming the platform into the world's biggest streamer.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Inside Mark Zuckerberg's AI Era. Mark Zuckerberg discusses how Meta's newest AI model Llama 3.1 will shape the future of business, technology and society.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets some of the world's most advanced, intelligent, robots. Will the creation of a synthetic species with human-like intelligence improve the human experience, or end it?

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Can we have real intimacy with machines? Emily Chang explores the future of such connections and the technologies powering a growing market of relationships-on-demand.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: From brain implants that allow paralyzed patients to communicate to the wearable devices enhancing our capabilities, brain-computer interfaces could change the way we use our minds forever.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: From birth to death, tech is stretching the boundaries of biology. In this episode of Posthuman, we explore the discoveries that could transform reproduction, healthcare and how we die.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Haslinda Amin reveals the burgeoning role of India's private space firms and their recent advances. Leaders and innovators divulge how they are pushing the boundaries of space.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Amid Seoul's pulsating energy, Haslinda Amin reveals an architectural renaissance that's reshaping the city, blending tradition with innovation while providing the world a new wave to follow.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Haslinda Amin explores the way robots and AI are integrated into Japanese life. From drones managing crops to unmanned harvesters, see how it's paving the way to a more efficient future.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: South Korea is emerging as a pivotal force in reshaping maritime transportation, leading the way to a future with autonomous ships and more eco-friendly propulsion systems.

programme.title: The Deal with Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly S3 - EP 4
programme.desc: The Future of Racing with F1 Academy's Susie Wolff. Susie Wolff, the managing director of F1 Academy, chats about how she's helping more female racers try to advance into the ranks of Formula One.

programme.title: The Deal with Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly S3 - EP 1
programme.desc: The College Sports Buzz With Georgia Tech's J Batt. Georgia Tech Athletics Director J Batt discusses the buzz around college athletics, including NIL and the transfer portal.

programme.title: The Deal with Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly S3 - EP 5
programme.desc: The hosts sit with Magic Johnson to discuss how he was able to make the transition from being a legendary basketball player to a successful businessman.

programme.title: Sex-for-Work Claims in West Africa's Rubber Industry
programme.desc: An activist seeking to address the alleged abuses contends she has been targeted with litigation to keep her quiet, which the company denied.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance Radio
programme.desc: The economy and the markets are "under surveillance" as we cover the latest in finance, economics and investment. Join Tom Keene, Paul Sweeney, Lisa Mateo, Michael Barr and other guests.

programme.title: Bloomberg Intelligence
programme.desc: Bloomberg's Alix Steel and Paul Sweeney harness the power of Bloomberg Intelligence to provide in-depth research and data on more than 2,000 companies and 130 industries.

programme.title: Why We Ride
programme.desc: Inspired by Audax Indonesia, this program uncovers the unique story and feelings of participant from 200 km to 600 km ride. Starting form the beginning ride, obstacles founded in the road, to the relieved feeling when arriving at the final point.

programme.title: Autoday
programme.desc: Automotive Program that discusses old cars from specs to storiesbehind the car. Also displays information about the car that is discussed the details of the device from home and abroad. Plus the public voxpop about the car being discussed. Packed in interesting themes.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S1
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Tough Trains
programme.desc: Tough Trains takes viewers on some of the most epic and hard-core train journeys on the planet. Trips that should take hours often take days, and nights that should be spent in towns are spent aboard tough trains.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: Stories Of Taste

programme.title: Kaya Rasa
programme.desc: A documentary program that discussesabout a journey of a chef who explores a secret ingredient in a dish.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life S4
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Luxe Asia S1
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a particular theme, be it homes, holidays or toys of the super-wealthy. It's Asia like you've never seen before - dripping in grandeur and extravagance, ready for anyone with deep enough pockets. Join host Anita Kapoor on a journey across the beautiful Asian continent, exploring the latest in luxury in Hong Kong, Sri Lanka, the Maldives, Singapore, Thailand, China, and Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Teman Bicara
programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S1
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Coastal Life
programme.desc: Coastal communities are communities that generally make a living by utilizing the sea and its contents. The challenges of life facing the sea provide unique socio-economic characteristics to coastal communities. Coastal Life talks about the lives of coastal communities in Indonesia in general. The topics of each episode include culture, harsh life, livelihoods, problems often faced, and how they survive admist the offers of modernity.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.desc: 2 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 3 - 5 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places.

programme.title: Apose Bos Baru
programme.desc: After the drama of losing his job, Andre tries to return to being Surya's assistant. But this time, he has to go through a probation period. Meanwhile, Dicky also loses his job due to a scandal. Now the vacant CEO position is filled by an unexpected figure, Ayu Ting Ting.

programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places.

programme.title: Apose Bos Baru
programme.desc: After the drama of losing his job, Andre tries to return to being Surya's assistant. But this time, he has to go through a probation period. Meanwhile, Dicky also loses his job due to a scandal. Now the vacant CEO position is filled by an unexpected figure, Ayu Ting Ting.

programme.title: Buddy Talk
programme.desc: Buddy Talk is one of our flagship programs which combines quick news headlines, talkshow, digital trends, sports, lifestyle, and entertainment news.

programme.title: Sport's Tale
programme.desc: Apart from being competitive, there are still many unique stories behind sports. The philosophy of sports club logos, to how much money is needed for a racing event, is discussed in this program.

programme.title: Beyond The Limit S2
programme.desc: Stories of young people who have pursued their dreams from an early age.

Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the world’s most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: Samurai Drama "Keijiro's Diary 3" Eps. 7 (R)
programme.desc: The third season of "Keijiro's Diary," well-received from 2004 to 2007, is coming back for a rebroadcast. Six years have passed since Moriguchi Keijiro, a retired constable at the magistrate’s office, became the caretaker of a merchant's dormitory in Negishi. Keijiro feels the passage of time since losing his daughter, Michiyo, in a tragic incident before her wedding. Despite this, he continues to resolve consultations, spending his days close to people's hearts.

programme.title: Dee Girls Talk - EP 283

programme.title: Made In Taiwan
programme.desc: "Made In Taiwan" records the rich and diverse history and humanities, local specialties, natural landscapes, as well as special ecology, plant research and other natural ecology, character close-ups, mountain scenery and etc., as the "Made In Taiwan" theme content. programme.title: Kangsi Coming

programme.title: Hit the Headlines
programme.desc: Headline Talk Show is a political show co-hosted by anchor Zhou Yuqin and director of the political center Lin Jiayuan. "Headline Talk Show" is the most daring-speak-out TV show. We speak out your voice!

programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: A LIFE OF HIS OWN - EP 13
programme.desc: This drama revolves around Cheung Kit's journey as he grapples with his luxurious lifestyle. Through a series of romantic entanglements and conflicts with friends and family, Kit is forced to confront his own immaturity and the consequences of his actions.

programme.title: D.I.D. & What's On Today - EP 18
programme.desc: Eccentric detective Xing Kai and superintendent Ding Luofeng come from strikingly similar backgrounds, but have taken very different paths in life. A serial murder case brings them together.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2575
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.desc: Young Chu Chu comes from a family of coroners. She meets Prince Xiao Jin Yu, a dignified prince in charge of criminal lawsuits. Together, they manage to unravel a shocking case that has dragged on for 18 years. After solving the case, she is certified as the Imperial Coroner.

programme.desc: This children's programme encourages children to ask questions, express themselves, and move towards their goals!

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2576
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Everlasting Longing & What's On Today - EP 19
programme.desc: Jun Qi Luo, the eldest daughter of a merchant family, disguises herself as a man to protect her family and business in a male-dominated society. She is exiled to Beixuan, where she faces hardships and must fight to reclaim her family's fortune after betrayal by relatives.

programme.title: Foodprint Tokyo
programme.desc: This show takes you to explore authentic Japanese cuisine and food culture in Tokyo, blending travel experiences with culinary adventures.

programme.title: DM Me Now
programme.desc: Before travelling, doing research is essential, and referring to KOLs' travel videos is also a must for the new generation! Join our beautiful hosts as they choose Malaysia as their destination, and invite many popular Internet celebrities to act as local guides to lead them in food and fun!

programme.title: Lifecyclopedia
programme.desc: In Lifecyclopeidia, Tony Hung leads children to face various out-of-school experiences, with the programme revolving around life topics such as gender, life and death, and more, allowing everyone to appreciate the answers through exploration.

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: The Sword and the Brocade - EP 2
programme.desc: In the middle Ming Dynasty, the distinguished Luo family suffers a downfall and wanted to solve the crisis through a marriage arrangement. The intelligent and introverted Shi Yiniang is chosen to become the much-coveted madame of the Yong Ping Duke Manor.

programme.title: News At 18:30
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every evening at 6:30pm.

programme.title: Vital Lifeline & What's On Today
programme.desc: The body of the urban dweller is prone to problems. Vital Lifeline deconstructs your health. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of various diseases, as well as physical therapists and sports therapists to teach appropriate exercises.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: D.I.D. - EP 20

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: Global View
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every day.

programme.title: Narcotics Heroes - EP 8
programme.desc: In order to crack down the top drug lord Man Wa who controls more than half the business in HK, undercover Ho Tin was placed beside Wa. Wa was betrayed by his most trusted Ho Tin and got arrested. Watch how Man Wa builds the new world!

programme.title: Trimming Success - EP 13
programme.desc: FAN TIN-LONG JASON (CHENG, KEVIN) has recently broken up with his girlfriend KO CHEUK-KEI CHOCO (CHAN MAN CHI, SHARON). As his father FAN KWONG-WING GEORGE (LAU DAN) falls ill suddenly, LONG, now single again, decides to move back to his old home in Stanley._x000D__x000D_There LONG meets his childhood friend PANG CHING (CHAN CHUNG LING, NADIA) again, who has now become a windsurfing trainer and a mechanical engineer.

programme.title: Fly With Me - EP 12
programme.desc: LEUNG HAU-CHI (Choi Siu Fun, Ada), a career woman in her 30s, has all the attributes of a typical Hong Kong girl - fussy, arrogant and easily irritated by the sight of beautiful young ladies. She is desperate for love and has been eagerly waiting for the thrilling miracles of life. As CHI is plunged into misery and despair, something strange happens and leads to her abrupt transformation into a superwoman of charm and immense strength.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 1
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Men Don't Cry - EP 9
programme.desc: With the support of the head of the Police Authority, Guangzhou’s top villain HO KEI-KIN (Wong Tze Wah) has been riding roughshod over everyone around him. He is so manipulative that he has explored every possible means in his fight for a house with the buck-toothed owner LING YUK-TSUI (Cecilia Yip). TSUI is happy to have met the upright and honorable WONG FEI-HUNG (Lam Kar Wah). The pair quickly falls in love and even feels ready for marriage.

programme.title: Wong Fei Hung - Master Of Kung Fu - EP 9
programme.desc: WONG FEI HUNG (WONG CHUNG CHAK, BOSCO) represents justice. His sayings and behavior in his youth already tell the world that he would rise to fame one day._x000D__x000D_ After his mother’s death, HUNG follows his father WONG KEI YING (KEUNG TAI WAI), whose nickname is "Guangdong Tiger", to earn a living by performing Kung Fu. After many years, they return to their home village in Foshan. HUNG’s heroic nature attracts MOK KWAI LAN (LI CHOI WA, RAIN) and they become lovers.

programme.title: Wong Fei Hung - Master Of Kung Fu - EP 10
programme.desc: WONG FEI HUNG (WONG CHUNG CHAK, BOSCO) represents justice. His sayings and behavior in his youth already tell the world that he would rise to fame one day._x000D__x000D_ After his mother’s death, HUNG follows his father WONG KEI YING (KEUNG TAI WAI), whose nickname is "Guangdong Tiger", to earn a living by performing Kung Fu. After many years, they return to their home village in Foshan. HUNG’s heroic nature attracts MOK KWAI LAN (LI CHOI WA, RAIN) and they become lovers.

programme.title: Trimming Success - EP 14
programme.desc: FAN TIN-LONG JASON (CHENG, KEVIN) has recently broken up with his girlfriend KO CHEUK-KEI CHOCO (CHAN MAN CHI, SHARON). As his father FAN KWONG-WING GEORGE (LAU DAN) falls ill suddenly, LONG, now single again, decides to move back to his old home in Stanley._x000D__x000D_There LONG meets his childhood friend PANG CHING (CHAN CHUNG LING, NADIA) again, who has now become a windsurfing trainer and a mechanical engineer.

programme.title: Fly With Me - EP 13
programme.desc: LEUNG HAU-CHI (Choi Siu Fun, Ada), a career woman in her 30s, has all the attributes of a typical Hong Kong girl - fussy, arrogant and easily irritated by the sight of beautiful young ladies. She is desperate for love and has been eagerly waiting for the thrilling miracles of life. As CHI is plunged into misery and despair, something strange happens and leads to her abrupt transformation into a superwoman of charm and immense strength.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 4
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Men Don't Cry - EP 10
programme.desc: TVB’s across century billion-dollar production shows you the legend of a property giant._x000D__x000D_The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities.
