After many years, they return to their home village in Foshan. HUNG’s heroic nature attracts MOK KWAI LAN (LI CHOI WA, RAIN) and they become lovers.

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsu's funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him...

programme.title: Crazy N' The City
programme.desc: An apathetic Hong Kong police officer, Chris, is weary of his 7-year patrol unit work life. Tension arises when an energetic and conscientious policewoman, Nam, becomes his partner. However, as time goes by, Nam's dedication and bravery in her line of duty begins to reignite Chris' passion for work and life.

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Destiny's Champion
programme.desc: An aging fighter relives the mistakes of his violent past through a poor and streetwise kid, who severely injures his nemesis during a battle to win a girl's heart.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon
programme.desc: Inspired by the story of Macau's Casino King Stanley Ho, the movie traces his blood-splattered fight to the top from 1930s to 1960s. In 1941, a young graduate, Benny Ho, flees Hong Kong during the Japanese invasion and heads for Macau. Benny starts as a labourer but rises to the top of the city's casino business with his courage, wisdom and diligence.

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Troublesome Night 4
programme.desc: This horror comedy consists of four short stories about a group of Hong Kong tourists who travel to the Philippines and encounter a series of paranormal events.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong's toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Flash Point
programme.desc: Sergeant Ma Jun is a hot-headed cop who vows to take down three powerful triad drug dealing brothers. His fellow officer, Wilson, is an experienced undercover agent working within the triad gang. They both agree to a partnership, but when Wilson's cover is blown, Jun is forced to confront the gang with the only way he knows - his fists.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the other's mole.

programme.title: Love on Delivery
programme.desc: A delivery boy Yin wants to impress his dream girl Li, so he enrols in a martial arts course to learn strange moves. Being timid, Yin saves Li while wearing a Garfield mask but the credit is stolen by Karate Master, Liu. To prove himself and win Li back, Yin defeats Liu in the ring with his unique martial arts move "Invincible Wind and Fire Spin".

programme.title: The Longest Nite
programme.desc: Two triad leaders, George and Kei, negotiate to join forces. As a bounty of $5 million is put on killing George, Kei assigns Sam, a corrupt cop who is also his right-hand man, to stop the killers. In the process, Sam meets a bald killer Tony, who stalks him and causes him troubles. When Sam realizes he is being set up, it was already too late...

programme.title: Model from Hell
programme.desc: Anna, an exceptional student in a modelling school, becomes the target of envy from fellow models, who all die mysteriously when they want to harm her. It turns out that when Anna is upset, she undergoes a terrifying transformation and can wield lethal psychic power...

programme.title: Women
programme.desc: Bo Yi's husband is having an affair, so Bo Yi divorces him and joins the "Happy Spinsters Club" set up by her friends. However, she soon finds out that she does not enjoy being single and while sorting out her thoughts, her repentant husband begs her forgiveness. She must now decide on what she truly wants.

programme.title: The Story Of My Son
programme.desc: Li attempts to make a fortune at the horse-racing tracks, but is subsequently entangled with loan sharks. Li becomes debt-laden while his sons are harassed by debt collectors, when more heart-wrenching events begin to unfold.

programme.title: Everlasting Regret
programme.desc: Adapted from an award-winning Chinese novel, the story follows the life of a legendary Shanghai beauty Wang Qi Yao from her glamorous to her simpler days. She stays true to her own way of life while surviving the constant betrayal of her men, and bears witness to the waves of change to her city from 1947 to 1981.

programme.title: The Illegal Immigrant
programme.desc: This is a gritty and realistic Chinatown tale about the life of a Chinese illegal immigrant and his journey in New York. He is looking for a fake marriage with a girl so as to gain the right of abode there. Despite all the hardships and misfortunes, he tries to cope with life and reach for his dreams.

programme.title: Mr. Possessed
programme.desc: Riley is cursed by an evil spirit to not be able to approach any woman. When he falls in love with Siu Yu, Riley's mother decides to use her to help him vanquish the evil spirit. On their wedding night, Riley passes out after protecting Siu Yu from the attack of the evil spirit. Can the two finally break the curse?

programme.title: Miss Du Shi Niang
programme.desc: A famous prostitute Du Shi Niang has always hoped to find her true love in the brothel. Eventually, she meets a handsome student Li Jia and they fall in love at first sight. However, Du Shi Niang is suspicious of him and uses all means to test his love, not knowing that some people are just unable to stand up to the test...

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays an arrogant god in Heaven who is being punished for his pranks and mistakes. He is sent to Earth and reincarnate as Mad Monk to change the destiny of three misguided souls - a prostitute, a beggar and a villain. The Mad Monk needs to complete the task in three days in order to return to Heaven.

programme.title: Perfect Girls
programme.desc: Chi will inherit his dying grandfather's fortune with one condition - he has to be married in a month, otherwise the money goes to his uncle, Robert. Chi falls in love with Siu Siu, but Robert intends to stop them by sending Moraine to seduce Chi. When Moraine decides to marry Chi for money, Robert stops her and reveals their plot.

programme.title: Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: Wonder Women
programme.desc: This is the story about a career woman and her friend going through life with their resilience and perseverance during the highs and lows of the Hong Kong economy over a decade, from the Handover in 1997 through 2007.

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: Dry Wood Fierce Fire
programme.desc: Alice works for a women's magazine and falls for Ryan, who is hired to run the men's magazine, both owned by magazine tycoon Michelle. Ryan only has eyes for Michelle and Alice tries to hide her true feelings to help him win Michelle.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Liu's disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hong escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hong for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hong escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chan's family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chan's daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Two feuding princes fight for the throne in the Qing Dynasty, causing many injuries and deaths to the commoners. Can the lady assassin who is drawn into this royal feud execute her assassination mission in time to help one of the princes secure the throne?

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her family's objection, so Hong's maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Peng Nan are a devoted couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he finds out that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan head's son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Hui's husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and causes her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to harm Wong's disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong has to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: What Price Honesty
programme.desc: In this period martial arts thriller, three police graduates are assigned to a town rife with crimes and corruption. They vow to uphold justice but are hampered by their corrupt superior, resulting in them putting their lives and the lives of their beloved in danger.

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Dai Tian Chou practices martial arts since young so he can avenge his father's death. He meets Wu Xiao Yan who is disguised as a man one day and is suddenly beaten by a group of gangsters. Wu begs her father to allow her to take Dai back home to recover. Little does Dai know this is his chance to take revenge.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couple's brothel.

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiancee suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiancee accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: The Twin Swords
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his wife Gan Lian Zhu are the famous "Twin Swords" in the martial arts world. One day, they stumble upon a kidnapping plot at the Red Lotus Temple and Lian Zhu is held captive. Wu successfully escapes to find the Gan family for help, not knowing that he is sending them into an ambush by the kidnappers. Can he finally save Lian Zhu?

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Shaolin's Hung falls in love with Fang while escaping the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung's son creates a new form of martial art combining his parents' kung fu styles.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fete. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant's confusion, threatening the couple's union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: The Supreme Swordsman
programme.desc: After beating several famous swordsmen, Chin Wu Hsin of the Mo Shan clan challenges Supreme Swordsman to a duel, hoping to win his title, and is beaten and humiliated. The winner taunts him to find a Supreme Sword made by Old Eagle, a famous sword-maker. When his offer to buy a sword from Old Eagle, is turned down, he challenges Old Eagle to a duel, and snatches his sword in a foul play. Old Eagle's own son Shih Yen-peh vows to avenge for his father...

programme.title: The Shadow Boxer
programme.desc: Skilled shadow Tai Chi boxer Ku Ting hides his skills by working as a construction worker. However, when the thugs assaulted his girlfriend, Ku Ting has no choice but to use his kung fu to show his enemies what it takes to keep justice in line.

programme.title: Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan...

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

Get ready for an electrifying season filled with surprises and brilliance!

programme.title: Night In The Greater Bay 2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Six evergreen Hong Kong male artistes are bringing Hong Kong-style food to different cities with the mobile food truck. Experience the culture of the Greater Bay Area and taste the culinary fusion of Hong Kong with the Brothers.

programme.title: Halo World Snooker Championship 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.
